resources.string: The calibration can not be saved because there is no Wifi and Bluetooth
There is not enough scan points, at least is needed two
Warning: not Wifi and Bluetooth scanned for a long period of time
There is not any level selected
New to Indoor Location? Find out how to start!
Please, stop current calibration first before starting a calibration in a new building
You are in positioning mode. To init calibration mode, please stop positioning first
RSSI: %d dBm, UUID: %s, Major: %d, Minor: %d, ID: %d, Distance: %f m, TX: %d
Click the Make visible to the primary and then go to the primary device and click Search more secondaries

Calibrate faster with multiple devices at the same time.

Select the device mode:
 - Primary: Take it in your hand and use it to calibrate.
 - Secondary: keep it in your pocket and increase the data captured by the principal
In this mode the smartphone will calibrate mirroring the actions in the master device. While paired, you can\'t use the device.
Bluetooth scanning not available. Wifi-only positioning
Select the building you want to start the positioning
Calibration point need to be inside the building

1) Select the level where you are 
2) Zoom in your area 
3) Start calibration by clicking on your current position
Do you want to cancel calibration?
Check if the other device is in the secondary mode screen.
Using compass for the best orientation
Uncalibrated compass. Please, rotate your phone smoothly in order to calibrate it

Click Search more secondaries on the primary device.

This device name is:
%s
Now you can lock the screen and start to calibrate in the primary device.
Calibration is disabled in this building
If you save a favourite location the last one is gonna be deleted
Important: in the secondary device click Make visible to the primary
Unfortunatelly, Android 9 imposes limitations that prevent the use of WiFi based indoor positioning
Need an account? Sign up for free
Image is too big. Upload a new one on the dashboard
Error reloading data. Are you connected?
Error: to refresh info you should be connected to a network
Connection error while uploading calibration data. Retrying in 10 seconds...
Otherwise, you can perform the calibration only with BLE activated.
Please deactivate this feature in your device FAQ and restart the App.
The first calibration point can not be null
Enable high accuracy location to start positioning
Enable high accuracy location to start calibration
There are no defined routes in the origin and / or destination floor. Check them in the Dashboard
There is not any path in the building. Add it in Dashboard.
Ground truth point need to be inside the building
There is not a position to link for the ground truth
Invalid point, all points must be inside the building or near
Make a route to this point
This building doesn\'t have calibrations, positioning is not possible
Closing this window you will be disconnected from the primary device
The positioning service is already running. Check if you have another Situm based App running on background
Data treatment consent will be revoked and all the user configuration will be deleted from this device.
Minimum value of SNR to use the value of a satellite
Connection error while uploading calibrations data
No buildings? How to create them
No internet connection available, please retry later
There is not any active building
Compass can not be used due to strong interferences. Orientation may not be accurate
Only routes with not accessible floor changes
Unfortunately, Android 9 imposes limitations that prevent WiFi scanning at a realtime rate. Apps are restricted to one scan every 30s.
Building calibration is required before positioning
To start calibration is mandatory to disable Wifi networks, is best to use only mobile networks.
Use always indoor position when possible
Enables the battery saver mode when device is idle
It permits to show which is the real position over the map
To apply these settings, it is necessary to reset the positioning
Use solid line pattern instead of the dotted pattern
Paint route with a solid line
Improves the precision in floor changes
(EXPERIMENTAL) Enable the camera to improve the quality of the location
It is not recommended to turn it off unless the sensor is not working properly
Improves indoor positioning on open spaces
It is not recommended to turn it off unless the sensor is not working properly
Turn on bluetooth again when user turns it off during positioning
Navigation is not available. The building doesn\'t have paths.
Show sensor relevant info on top of screen
Start the positioning when the app starts
Start the positioning when the app starts
Plase start positioning in order to see current SNR value
The positioning need to be stopped in order to reload the building data. When the reload is completed you can start again the positioning with the updated building
Receive intermediate position updates, based on the internal sensors of the device, to improve the user experience.
Routes that minimize floor changes will be calculated even if the route is longer
When enabled routes are used to improve location engine
SNR value that is considered outdoor the position
Allow position in outsides use GPS
Improve precision but consume more battery
Improve navigation ignoring low quality location updates
Distance threshold from when a floor change is considered reached
Distance threshold from when the destination is considered reached
Distance threshold from when the next indication is considered reached
Time interval between sending an indication and the next
Use gyro, use compass, use barometer...
Show always the indoor locations with bearing even with low bearing quality
The WiFi scan interval will be the normal and if throttling is detected it will change to one scan every 30 seconds
Distance to which the user is considered to have left the route
Round the distances of the indications
Time to show the first indication
Wait time before recalculating the route
Prevents positioning from being stopped when the application is in background
Upload interval realtime to Situm cloud
(Beta) Enable button to show calibration screen
Show indications in the screen top
Show the WiFi, BLE scans and SNR value (only in global mode)
Recommended settings will be activated in order to get a simplified navigation and in the same time satisfactory
Use only in communication with Situm support team
Put the value in seconds (need positioning restart)
Long press on the map to create
Customize the app with account logo and colors defined in the Dashboard when the option is enabled. Application will be reloaded.
Use a loc.proto.sim file to simulate locations
Important: make sure that the secondaries are visible.
Tap on the device to connect:
Connection error: the device %s has been disconnected
Auto-scale floor plans in order to improve performance. It is only recommended to disable it on high-end devices. Application will be reloaded.
Calibration has been canceled due to WIFI scan throttling detected.
Open browser to select simulation file
Always show indoor locations with bearing
Ignore the WiFi throttling during the positioning in Android 10
Time to return the first indication
Time to ignore unexpected plant changes
Interval to upload locations to Realtime
Error: could not retrieve the organization theme
Error: not custom theme defined in Dashboard
Application won\'t work without the Location permission
The WiFi should be disabled during positioning. You can change this behaviour in the settings.
The Google location service is unable to return a location. Please keep walking or disable the indoor/outdoor mode
You don\'t have buildings. Create one first
User not in building, no position available
Disable WiFi to achieve the highest accuracy
